long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small SharePoint Online extension which displays
1. List Internal Name, Id and Unique Permissions in viewlist.aspx
2. Subsite Url Name and Unique Permissions in viewlist.aspx
3. Field Internal Names on list settings page
4. Site Contents and Site Settings links near to the gear icon
